Card.cardDescription: Place this card into the judgment zone of a target hero when you play it. At the beginning of that hero's turn, if this card is in that hero's judgment zone, that hero performs a judgment. If the result of the judgment card is not a HEARTS suit, that hero skips his next main phase.

Place this card into your judgment zone when you play it. At the beginning of each hero's turn, if this card is in that hero's judgment zone, that hero performs a judgment. If the result of the judgment card is a 2 SPADES to 9 SPADES, LIGHTNING BOLT deals 3 LIGHTNING damage to that hero; otherwise move this card to the judgment zone of the next hero in sequence. Whenever this card's effect is cancelled or ignored, move it to the judgment zone of the next hero.

Place this card into the judgment zone of a target hero when you play it. At the beginning of that hero's turn, if this card is in that hero's judgment zone, that hero performs a judgment. If the result of the judgment card is not a CLUBS suit, that hero skips their draw phase.
